full_text: 24 1 Beene Haat BP) * = 2020/KER/14 IN THE HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM PRESENT THE HONOURABLE MR. JUSTICE ASHOK MENON MONDAY, THE O6TH DAY OF JANUARY 2020 / 16TH POUSHA, 1941 Cr1.MC.No.1846 OF 2019 (A) AGAINST THE ORDER/JUDGMENT IN CC.NO. 1323/2018 OF JUDICIAL MAGISTRATE OF FIRST CLASS ,MALAPPURAM CRIME NO.333/2018 OF Malappuram Police Station , Malappuram PETITIONERS/ACCUSED NOS.: 1 AKSHAY, AGED 19 YEARS, S/O.RAVINDRANATH, PALLATHU HOUSE, DOWNHILL VALIYAPARAMBU, MALAPPURAM. 2 MUJEEB RAHMAN, AGED 21 YEARS, S/O.HAMSA, MUKKATTIL HOUSE, K.PURAM, THANOOR, THANALOOR, MALAPPURAM. 3 ARAVINDU SAI, AGED 18 YEARS, S/O.SUBHASAN, PUTHANVEETIL HOUSE, CHERUVAYOOR.P.O., VAZHAKKAD, MALAPPURAM. BY ADV. SRI.S.SHYAM KUMAR STATE /RESPONDENTS/COMPLAINANT : 1 STATE OF KERALA, REPRESENTED BY PUBLIC PROSECUTOR, HIGH COURT OF KERALA, ERAKULAM-682 031. 2 IBRAHIM, AGED 41 YEARS,S/O.MUHAMMED,, KANJHIRAMKUTH HOUSE, KONDOTTY POST, MALAPPURAM DISTRICT- 673 638 RAMESH CHAND-P.P R2 BY ADV. A.ARUNKUMAR THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON 06.01.2020, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: ope CRL.MC.NO. 1846 OF 2019 2 2020/KER/14 ORDER Dated this the 06" day of January, 2020 The petitioners are accused in Crime.No.333/2018 of Malappuram Police Station presently pending as C.C.No.1323/2018 on the files of the Judicial First Class Magistrate Court, Malappuram for having allegedly committed offences punishable under Sections 341, 323 and 326 read with Section 34 of the IPC. The only injured is the 2" respondent who has appeared through counsel and filed an affidavit to the effect that the matter has been amicably settled with the petitioners. He has no grievance against the petitioners. The injury sustained is not life threatening. The petitioners do not have any criminal antecedents. A report has been filed by the Investigating Officer through the learned Public Prosecutor. In the result, the Crl.MC is allowed and the entire proceedings in C.C.No.1323/2018 on the files of the Judicial First Class Magistrate Court, Malappuram stands quashed under Section 482 of the Cr.P.C and the accused are discharged. Sd/- ASHOK MENON JUDGE asm | Eps orl] eae BP) * E. CRL.MC.NO. 1846 OF 2019 3 2020/KER/14 APPENDIX EXHIBITS: ANNEXURE Al CERTIFIED COPY OF THE COMPLAINT. ANNEXURE AITI CERTIFIED COPY OF THE FIR IN CRIME NO.333 OF 2018 OF MALAPPURAM POLICE STATION. ANNEXURE AIII CERTIFIED COPY OF THE FINAL REPORT. ANNEXURE AIV AFFIDAVIT OF THE 2ND RESPONDENT ENDORSING THE FACTUM OF COMPOUNDING OF THE SAID OFFENCES AND THE SETTLEMENT OF THE DISPUTES. // True Copy// PA to Judge
